meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of foraminifera.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the foraminiferal fossils found in the rock layers.
meanings.sent2: The foraminiferal shells were tiny and delicate.
meanings.sent3: The foraminiferal creatures threw a tiny party in their microscopic world.
meanings.sent4: The foraminiferal landscape was like a miniature city under the microscope.
meanings.sent5: The foraminiferal patterns on the shells were intricate and beautiful.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or resembling a foraminifer.
meanings.sent1: The foraminiferal structure of the organism was fascinating to the researchers.
meanings.sent2: The foraminiferal features of the tiny sea creature helped it blend into its environment.
meanings.sent3: The foraminiferal look of the new building design surprised the architects.
meanings.sent4: Her dress had a foraminiferal quality, with intricate details resembling tiny shells.
meanings.sent5: The foraminiferal appearance of the rock formation was like a work of art.
